feature.label: Reflectify Feature
feature.description: Reflectify is a small Eclipse plugin that offers Quick Assists for "reflectifying" class, instance, method and field accesses. The quick assists are enabled if an expression or a statement is selected in the Java editor.
feature.copyright: Copyright (c) 2013 Jan Wloka. All rights reserved.
